gui.hearthwell.editmode.2: Right click to edit a node.
gui.hearthwell.editmode.3: Middle click to create/delete a node.
gui.hearthwell.editmode.4: Use the command "/hw edit" to toggle Edit Mode.
gui.hearthwell.editmode.5: Use the command "/hw reload" to load the map from the config file.
gui.hearthwell.title: Map of the Well
commands.hearthwell.hw.toggle_edit_mode: Hearth Well Edit Mode is now: %s
jei.hearthwell.description.prayer_letter: A prayer to the Gods, requesting help in a time of need. When thrown, this item will summon a Hearth Well.
jei.hearthwell.description.flare_torch: Used to control Hearth Well Flares. Control multiple flares by sneaking.
jei.hearthwell.description.myst_dust: Obtained by breaking the Mysterious Bushes that grow on top of Mysterious Grass.
jei.hearthwell.description.myst_bush: These grow on top of Mysterious Grass. When broken, they drop Mysterious Dust
jei.hearthwell.description.myst_bush_sma: These grow on top of Mysterious Grass. When broken, they may drop Mysterious Dust
jei.hearthwell.description.crystal: Obtained by breaking the Crystal Ore that may form near the HearthWell.
jei.hearthwell.description.token_base: When a block is right-clicked with a Token Base, a letter will appear. To get any token, you must use these letters to write the desired Token's Name.
jei.hearthwell.recipe.burst.title: Burst Seed Recipes
jei.hearthwell.recipe.crush.title: Crushing Recipes
jei.hearthwell.recipe.flare.title: Flare Recipes
jei.hearthwell.recipe.flare_item.title: Flare Item Recipes
jei.hearthwell.recipe.influence.title: Influence Recipes
